Artifact Exists Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2018-05-23  | Version: 0.0.6
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • FAQ
Examples
  • Check existence
  • Using checksums
  • Configuring repository

exists:local

Full name:

org.honton.chas:exists-maven-plugin:0.0.6:local

Description:

Set a property if the artifact in the local repository is same as the just built artifact. The local repository is either defined in settings.xml or defaults to ~/.m2/repository. Using the defaults, executing this plugin will prevent the install plugin from reinstalling identical artifacts to the local repository. This situation will often occur with a recurring schedule build job.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 0.0.2.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: verify.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
artifact String 0.0.2 The artifact of the project to compare. Defaults to the project's principal artifact.
Default value is: ${project.build.finalName}.${project.packaging}.
failIfExists boolean 0.0.3 Fail the build if the artifact already exists in the repository.
Default value is: ${failIfExists}.
failIfNotExists boolean 0.0.3 Fail the build if the artifact does not exist in the repository.
Default value is: ${failIfNotExists}.
project String 0.0.2 The project Group:Artifact:Version to compare. Defaults to the current project's GAV.
Default value is: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}.
property String 0.0.2 The property to set if the artifact exists in the deploy repository. The default property of maven.deploy.skip may cause the deploy plugin to skip execution.
Default value is: maven.install.skip.
skip boolean 0.0.4 Skip executing this plugin
Default value is: false.
User property is: exists.skip.
skipIfSnapshot boolean 0.0.2 If checksums are not used, should this plugin skip checking SNAPSHOT versions?
Default value is: true.
useChecksum boolean 0.0.2 Set whether checksum is used to compare artifacts. The default is the install plugin's configuration to create checksums (property createChecksum).
Default value is: ${createChecksum}.
userProperty boolean 0.0.3 Set the property as a user property instead of a project property. This will make the property available in the modules of a parent POM.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

artifact:

The artifact of the project to compare. Defaults to the project's principal artifact.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.finalName}.${project.packaging}

failIfExists:

Fail the build if the artifact already exists in the repository.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.3
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${failIfExists}

failIfNotExists:

Fail the build if the artifact does not exist in the repository.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.3
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${failIfNotExists}

project:

The project Group:Artifact:Version to compare. Defaults to the current project's GAV.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}

property:

The property to set if the artifact exists in the deploy repository. The default property of maven.deploy.skip may cause the deploy plugin to skip execution.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: maven.install.skip

skip:

Skip executing this plugin
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No
  • User Property: exists.skip
  • Default: false

skipIfSnapshot:

If checksums are not used, should this plugin skip checking SNAPSHOT versions?
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

useChecksum:

Set whether checksum is used to compare artifacts. The default is the install plugin's configuration to create checksums (property createChecksum).
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${createChecksum}

userProperty:

Set the property as a user property instead of a project property. This will make the property available in the modules of a parent POM.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.3
  • Required: No
  • Default: false
